label: roleCode
comment: The code specifying the role for this cooperating organization.
The code specifying the role for this payment financial institution, such as intermediary or settlement agent.
The code specifying the role of this guest person.

domainIncludes.comment: An organized structure set up for a particular purpose, such as a business, government body, department, charity, or financial institution that is working together with another organization, business, or person.
An institution that provides financial services and financial transactions for payment.
